headline: Is Healthpeak Properties Mispriced After 2025 Selloff and Portfolio Repositioning?
summary: Wondering if Healthpeak Properties is a quietly mispriced REIT or a value trap in plain sight? This article is going to break down what the current share price really implies. The stock has had a rough patch, with the share price down 6.8% over the last week and 15.6% year to date. That has many investors questioning whether the market is getting too pessimistic. Recently, the company has been in the spotlight for its ongoing portfolio repositioning toward higher quality healthcare assets...
